title: Book Carousel Logo
content:
This is a logo I designed for a Children's Bookstore titled Book Carousel, combining the image of an open book with with carousel lights. Could I please have some feedback? Also any suggesting to how I might apply color would be very helpful!

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108205041im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bookcarousel_4560.jpg)
author: kreative88

comments.content:
this is pretty rough, but what do you think of this? When I saw the book icon you designed I immediately though of the top of a carousel.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108205041im_/http:/typophile.com/files/book_5001.png)

I think you need to adjust the letter spacing.. a lot. Also, I don't really like the O's. I think it would look better if the O's were more round. That way it would create a repetition with the O in the icon.

Just a thought.

Definitely go with Kikkoman's idea. Kerning needs work though.

penn
